alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:13PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Goshen and southeastern Platte Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 312 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Y-O Ranch, or near Wheatland, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wheatland, Slater, Chugcreek, Bordeaux and Y-O Ranch. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 71 and 79. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; East Platte County; Goshen County
